This is by far the worst movie ever made, it's even worse than Mega Shark Vs. Giant Octopus! But the quality is alright, so thanks. I've had a few laughs thanks to these intensely bad actors.

@ Frice:

"...Overall a decent action flick especially for military buffs..."

Couldn't be farther from the truth, unless you are talking about the broke-dick ("I was gonna join, but I have a broken vagina, etc") arm-chair chicken-shit, know-nothing 'historian' wannabes. 

Fun Fact of the day: Most real servicemen watch movies like this and immediately begin picking apart the inaccuracies, to the point of distraction - if there are too many, the movie is simply unenjoyable. This is one of those movies. 

For Marines specifically, proper wear of the uniform is emphasized to the point where any discrepancies on-screen, which would be invisible to the civilian viewer, stand out like a glowing beacon of shittiness. If the story and acting are good enough, small inconsistencies can be overlooked (A Few Good Men) and the movie may still be enjoyed. This is not one of those movies. 

If you want to see a movie that won't make a real Marine cringe with embarrassment, watch Battle Los Angeles (The obvious two exceptions are the prolific usage of the word "lieutenant" by enlistedmen - it is simply "Sir," and the spelling out of "F.O.B." which is called a FOB (rhymes with "knob.))

/rant. 

Thanks for the upload, and hopefully *somebody* is able to enjoy this floating turd of a movie.
